actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to better provide for compensation for certain persons injured in the course of employment at the Rocky Flats site in Colorado.
short_title: Rocky Flats Special Exposure Cohort Act

summary.text: Rocky Flats Special Exposure Cohort Act - Amends the Energy Employees Occupational Illness Compensation Program Act of 2000 to provide compensation (for beryllium- and radiation-related health conditions) for employees of the Department of Energy (DOE) or of a DOE contractor employed for an aggregate number of at least 250 work days before January 1, 2006, at the Rocky Flats (nuclear weapons production and testing) site in Colorado.

titles.title: Rocky Flats Special Exposure Cohort Act
A bill to better provide for compensation for certain persons injured in the course of employment at the Rocky Flats site in Colorado.
